summary: Implements a ConvNeXt V2 building block that sequentially applies a depthwise convolution, layer‑norm (using a channels‑last layout for speed), pointwise linear transformations (realized as 1×1 convolutions), GELU activation, and optional stochastic‑depth regularization.
business_intent: Provide a reusable, high‑performance component for assembling ConvNeXt V2 vision models, enabling efficient feature extraction and regularization within deep convolutional architectures.
